DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To determine number patient 15 30 year old treat newly diagnose cancer Vanderbilt-Ingram Cancer Center ( VICC ) , middle Tennessee , state Tennessee 1990 2005 . - To determine outcomes patient . - To determine number patient enrol clinical trial VICC . - To compare outcomes patient treat trial versus treat trial provide disease . - To compare number patient treat clinical trial first see Vanderbilt Children 's Hospital v Vanderbilt University Hospital . - To determine referral pattern patient VICC . - To compare outcomes patient treat VICC v middle Tennessee v state Tennessee v entire nation . - To determine reason enrol clinical trial . OUTLINE : Cancer case take Vanderbilt-Ingram Cancer Center ( VICC ) Registry Tennessee Cancer Registry examine number type cancer , mortality rate break county health department region , electronic medical record , treatment outcome . Data analyze comparison number new cancer patient , mortality rate , referral pattern VICC versus number new cancer patient region , state , country .
